title: Career rushing yards leaders - Los Angeles Rams 1937 to 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Rushing yards for 20 number of Months.
The maximum Rushing yards 10138.0 is found at Month Steven Jackson and the minimum is found at Tommy Wilson where Month is 2130.0.
The highest Month Steven Jackson has 8008.0 more Rushing yards than the lowest Month Tommy Wilson.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Rushing yards in the y axis.
The maximum Rushing yards 10138.0 is found at Month Steven Jackson and the minimum is found at Tommy Wilson where Month is 2130.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Rushing yards for 20 number of Months.
The maximum Rushing yards 10138.0 is found at Month Steven Jackson and the minimum is found at Tommy Wilson where Month is 2130.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Rushing yards in the y axis.
The Rushing yards is highest at Month Steven Jackson and lowest at Month Tommy Wilson.
There is a difference of 8008.0 between the maximum Month Steven Jackson and minimum Month Tommy Wilson.
Rushing yards at Month Steven Jackson is 10138.0 , second place is Eric Dickerson at 7245.0, and thirdly is Marshall Faulk at 6959.0.
The Rushing yards has decreased over the past 20 Months.
The lowest value 2130.0 at Tommy Wilson is almost 2.51 times smaller than the average value 4039.9.
The Rushing yards is 80798.0 if we add up values of all Months.
